description:
This dataset is contains orthorectified imagery from
the Advanced Visible and Near Infrared Radiometer type 2 (AVNIR-2)
sensor on-board the Advanced Land Observing Satellite (ALOS) \"DAICHI\".

The AVNIR-2 ORI product was created from AVNIR-2 1B1 data after stereo
matching with reference to ALOS's Panchromatic Remote-sensing Instrument
for Stereo Mapping (PRISM)-derived DSM AW3D30. The orthorectification
process used AW3D30 DSM data when available and SRTM (The Shuttle
Radar Topography Mission) DSM data otherwise.

links.title: Run the example for JAXA/ALOS/AVNIR-2/ORI in the Earth Engine Code Editor

gee:terms_of_use:
The Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) releases the ALOS
Orthorectified Image Product (ALOS-ORI) free of charge and open
to the public with the following conditions:

*  When you provide or publish any products or services to a
third party using this dataset, you are kindly requested to display
that the original data is provided by JAXA.
*  When you publish your product(s) using this dataset, you are
kindly requested to show the copyright (© JAXA) and the source
of the data.
*  JAXA does not guarantee the quality and reliability of this
dataset and JAXA assume no responsibility whatsoever for any direct
or indirect damage and loss caused by use of this dataset. Also,
JAXA will not be responsible for any damages of users due to changing,
deleting or terminating the provision of this dataset.
title: ALOS/AVNIR-2 ORI

gee:schema.description: Satellite alitutude at scene center (km)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_ALTITUDE

gee:schema.description: Frame number of scene center (0000 to 7198)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_FRAME_NUMBER

gee:schema.description: Satellite heading angle including Earth rotation at scene center (radians)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_HEADING_ANGLE

gee:schema.description: Image skew angle at scene center (milli-radians)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_SKEW_ANGLE

gee:schema.description: Azimuth angle of the sun at scene center (°)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_SOLAR_AZIMUTH

gee:schema.description: Solar elevation (zenith) angle of the sun at scene center (°)
gee:schema.name: CENTER_SOLAR_ZENITH

gee:schema.description: Scene center time (UTC).
gee:schema.name: CENTER_START_TIME

gee:schema.description: Incident angle "SNN.NNN" (S: Incident direction R/L, NN.NNN degrees)
gee:schema.name: INCIDENT_ANGLE

gee:schema.description: Orbit direction ("A"/"D": ascending/descending)
gee:schema.name: ORBIT_DIRECTION

gee:schema.description: Nominal satellite orbit inclination (°)
gee:schema.name: ORBIT_INCLINATION

gee:schema.description: Nominal satellite orbit cycle period (min)
gee:schema.name: ORBIT_CYCLE_PERIOD

gee:schema.description: Angle of the vertical axis of image frame from the map northing axis.
gee:schema.name: ORIENTATION_ANGLE

gee:schema.description: Processing date (JST)
gee:schema.name: PROCESSING_DATE

gee:schema.description: Processing facility.
gee:schema.name: PROCESSING_FACILITY

gee:schema.description: Processing software version.
gee:schema.name: PROCESSING_SOFTWARE_VESRION

gee:schema.description: Processing time (JST)
gee:schema.name: PROCESSING_TIME

gee:schema.description:
Product ID e.g: "ABBBCCDE"

*  A: Observation mode ("O")
*  BBB: Processing level ("ORI")
*  CC: Framing ("RF" Geo-reference, "GT", Geo-coded True-north
"GM", Geo-coded Map-north),
*  D: Map projection ("U": UTM, "P": PS)
*  E: Sensor type ("N": nadir 35km, "F": forward 35km
"B": backward 35km "W": nadir 70km)
*  A: AVNIR-2
gee:schema.name: PRODUCT_ID

gee:schema.description: Product version number
gee:schema.name: PRODUCT_NUMBER

gee:schema.description:
RSP ID e.g: "MPPPFFFFSN"

*  M: Oribit direction ("A": ascending, "D": descending)
*  PPP: RSP path number (0 to 671)
*  FFFF: RSP frame number (0000 to 7199)
*  SN: Scene shift ("-2" to " 2")
gee:schema.name: RSP_ID

gee:schema.description: Satellite name.
gee:schema.name: SATELLITE_NAME

gee:schema.description:
Scene ID e.g. "AABBBCDDDDDEEEE"

*  AA: Satellite code ("AL": ALOS)
*  BBB: Sensor code ("PSM": PRISM, "AV2": AVNIR-2)
*  C: Sensor type ("N": nadir 35km, "F": forward 35km,
"B": backward 35km "W": nadir 70km, "A": AVNIR-2)
*  DDDDD: Total orbit number of scene center ("00001" to "99999")
*  EEEE: Frame number of scene center, including scene shift
("0000" to "7199")
gee:schema.name: SCENE_ID

gee:schema.description: Sensor code ("PSM": PRISM, "AV2": AVNIR-2)
gee:schema.name: SENSOR_CODE

gee:schema.description: Sensor type ("N": nadir 35km, "F": forward 35km, "B": backward 35km "W": nadir 70km, "A": AVNIR-2)
gee:schema.name: SENSOR_TYPE

gee:schema.description: Total orbit number of scene center.
gee:schema.name: TOTAL_ORBIT_NUMBER
